oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Reunion photograph
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Reunion photograph taken at Chickamauga battlefield. Pvt. Jacob J. Vandergriff, Co. A, 6th Tenn. Mtd. Inf., USA is featured on the second row to the right. Vandergriff mustered in at Chattanooga on August 20, 1864 at the age of 19. Born in Hamilton County, TN, his occupation was in farming. He mustered out in Nashville on June 30, 1865.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vandergriff, Jacob J.
